item.title: 2025 Annual Steam & Electrical Shutdowns | May 10-May 17
item.description: 2025 Annual Shutdowns • Campus wide steam and electrical distribution systems outages will take place beginning Saturday May, 10th and ending on Sunday May 17th. This work is done on the main Rensselaer campus annually in order to perform critical infrastructure preventative maintenance. The Physical Plant works closely with the Registrar’s Office, Summer Arch, Summer at Rensselaer and Rensselaer’s Conference Services to minimize the impact to our students.

item.title: Pittsburgh Building Closed for Renovations This Summer
item.description: The Pittsburgh Building will be fully closed for renovations beginning Monday, May 12, and will remain inaccessible through Wednesday, August 21. During this period, no access will be permitted for any faculty, staff, students, or visitors. Please plan accordingly. Thank you for your cooperation as we work to improve our facilities.

item.title: RPI Announces Winners of the 2025 McKinney Writing Contest with Author Lan Samantha Chang
item.description: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) announced the winners of the 84th annual McKinney Writing Contest on April 9 with the help of award-winning author and director of the Iowa Writers’ Workshop, Lan Samantha Chang.

item.title: DotCIO Network Maintenance on 05/14/2025 5pm to 7pm ET
item.description: DotCIO will be performing necessary maintenance on the core campus network on 05/14/2025 from 5:00PM to 7:00PM ET. This work will affect Wi-Fi and wired network connectivity and campus telephones in several areas, including the Armory/Mueller Center, CII, DCC, ECAV, Field House, JEC, Science Center, and the Student Union. Some individual areas will also experience brief network outages. Any issues after the above maintenance window, please submit a Support Request via https:\.rpi.edu

item.title: TIAA Confidential Counseling (In-Person) | May 13
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, May 13, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits. Consultations will be conducted in 60 minute increments. To schedule your individual retirement counseling, please call TIAA at 1-800-732-8353 or online at https://shared.tiaa.org/public/publictools/events…
